entry.title: The Second Mr Wayne
entry.summary:
Author: HagiaSophia

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,201Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 0

Summary: A naive young reporter is whisked off his feet when he meets a handsome but grieving billionaire when they meet when working in Europe. Making their new life together in Gotham, he starts to regret his hasty decision as events lead him to believe his husband is hiding a dark secret. A SuperBat re working of “Rebecca” with a very different twist and ending. This work is finished and I’ll be uploading chapters over the next couple of weeks,

entry.title: Bat Caves and Lantern Lights
entry.summary:
Author: Queerbutstillhere

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,257Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 843

Summary: For over twenty years, Bruce Wayne had gotten away with leading a double life. Or rather, a triple life. He got away with hiding that he was Batman, and he got away with hiding that he was a vampire.Hal Jordan is an agent with a department that specializes in working with Mythological and Supernatural creatures.They meet when the truth about Bruce is revealed to the public.Bruce has to make hard choices with the goal of protecting his family, Hal Jordan is just trying to do his job, and Bruce's kids seem determined to get them to keep meeting.

entry.title: To cage a star
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,361Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 609

Summary: "Excuse me, um... I need to find someone, would you- would you mind helping me?"The lady who is asked is an old woman at a bus stop, with a warm expression on her face."Yes, dear, who are you looking for?""Um..." The little girl in the pale green dress reaches for her small purse and pulls out a carefully kept piece of paper to give the old lady. "His name is written on the back...""And who may this person be to you, dear?""My dad... Mom said Mr. Bruce Wayne is my dad."

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,295Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 71

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.

entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,500Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 132

Summary: Hal Jordan is afraid he wouldn't be a good partner. He's afraid he wouldn't be a good father. He's afraid he'll fuck things up and doesn't even realize it.But with friends with benefits, he could get someone warm to hold at night and when the sun rises, they would part ways and never see each other again.That is what friends with benefits are supposed to be.Right?Then why is Hal living in Bruce's manor, eating his food and co-parenting his kids?

entry.title: Turbulence
entry.summary:
Author: LuthienLuinwe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,007Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 230

Summary: After a soul-crushing breakup, Hal Jordan’s brilliant solution is to flee to Gotham City—because what better place to forget your problems than the crime capital of America?New city, new apartment, no ex-girlfriend. Perfect plan!Except Bruce Wayne keeps appearing everywhere like a judgmental shadow. Meanwhile, Hal’s determined to prove he’s handling his breakup like an adult while Bruce is equally determined to prove Hal is a disaster with a ring.When Hal’s emotional avoidance collides with Bruce’s emotional constipation, both heroes discover there are some things even they can’t outrun or out-brood.
